name: Hill St
description: A perfectly graded segment of Hill Street, engineered for optimal residential flow, subtly hinting at the perfectly orchestrated predictability of future living. You navigate Hill St, where the self-cleaning pavement inclines gently, a smooth transition into Hill Valley's multi-tiered urban planning. To the north, Hill St ascends towards Main Street's commercial zenith, while to the south, it continues its pre-programmed trajectory. Eastward, the serene Courthouse Square unfurls, a verdant marvel of bio-engineering. The ambient air, infused with calming pheromones, is broken only by the distant, harmonious hum of civic infrastructure, masking any inconvenient realities.
